publications.title: Agentic Edge Orchestration
authors: We propose a method of distributing inference of an AI model in an edge cluster. Our approach uses reinforcement learning to optimise for low end-to-end latency and also accounts for real time network conditions.

publications.title: Memetic Knapsack
authors: We propose a new memetic algorithm for the 0/1 Knapsack problem that integrates Lagrangian Relaxation for variable fixing, Deterministic Crowding with Island Model for diversity, and Simulated Annealing local search. We evaluate it against a standard Genetic Algorithm baseline.

publications.title: Collab-Doc
authors: Implementation of a simplified shared document system, with support for concurrency and access control, implemented in C.

publications.title: MyShell
authors: A custom shell, implemented in C.

publications.title: C-Shark
authors: A terminal based packet sniffer, implemented in C.

publications.title: Minimal ZSH
authors: Minimal zsh setup with autosuggestions, syntax highlighting, history tweaks, git branch display, and python virtualenv detection.
